tips: Some Features are mutually exclusive, and a game can only contain one feature from a given group

graphics.name: Graphics
tips: Graphics - 2D caps at V5 and 3D caps at V7
Tech level of the game is calculated as average of tech levels of all 2D and 3D Graphics features in Custom Engine, so only put a single graphics feature that has the highest tech level
All graphic features are mutually exclusive, except for Advanced Stereoscopic 3D

storiesQuests.name: Stories/Quests
tips: Story/Quests has two groups, full motion video, moral choices, and reactive quests are separate

engine.name: Engine
tips: Engine has one group, save game, video playback, basic physics, mod support, advanced physics, save to cloud, mmo support, software development kit, multi-platform optimization are separate

gameplay.name: Gameplay
tips: Gameplay doesn't have groups, game tutorials, better user experience, achievements, character progression, skill trees, cooperative play, virtual reality headset are separate

dialogue.name: Dialogue
tips: Dialogue has two groups, better dialogue, dialogue tree are separate

levelDesign.name: Level Design
tips: Level Design doesn't have groups, level editor, easter eggs, mini games, dynamic environment, no loading screens are separate

ai.name: AI
tips: AI doesn't have groups, better ai, ai companions, self-learning ai are separate

worldDesign.name: World Design
tips: World Design doesn't have groups, open world, day & night cycles, rich backstory, virtual economy, realistic weather, dynamic world are separate
